feedback.comment: “I’ve only recently moved to New York, but I’ve been practicing yoga for more than 20 years now. I was really happy to find that Mille Yoga was able to cater to yoga practitioners of my skill level. I love this studio.”
feedback.name: KIM HANA

feedback.comment: “So far, Mille Yoga’s Vinyasa yoga classes have helped me improve my core strength, my flexibility, my concentration, and my ability to stay calm under pressure. If you’ve ever wanted to try yoga, you should definitely do it, and you should definitely try it at the new Mille Yoga studio.”
feedback.name: KIM HANA
